# Introduction {.unnumbered}

[Workshop homepage](https://uofudelphi.github.io/2023-05-17-Intro_R/)


This page contains the content for the R [Software Carpentry](https://www.google.com/search?q=software+carpentry&oq=software+carpentry+&aqs=chrome..69i57j69i59l3j35i39j69i61l3.4031j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8) workshop taught at the University of Utah on May 17-18.


**Instructors**: Rebecca Barter, George Vega Yon

These materials on this page have been adapted from the original [Software Carpentry R for Reproducible Scientific Analysis workshop](https://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/).
